#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int n ;
int cnt  = 0;
 
int solve (int a[100][100],int x, int y){
 
    if(x == n && y == n )
        //return true;
        return (cnt+1);
 
 
    a[x][y] = 1;
 
    if(a[x+1][y] == 0)
        //if(solve(a,x+1,y) == true)
        //    return true;
        cnt = solve(a,x+1,y);
 
    if(a[x][y+1] == 0)
        //if(solve(a,x,y+1) == true)
          //  return true;
        cnt = solve(a,x,y+1);
 
    if(a[x-1][y] == 0)
        //if(solve(a,x-1,y) == true)
          //  return true;
        cnt = solve(a,x-1,y);
 
    if(a[x][y-1] == 0)
        //if(solve(a,x,y+1) == true)
          //  return true;
        cnt = solve(a,x,y-1);
 
    a[x][y] = 0;
    return cnt;
}
 
 
int main(){
    cin>>n;
    int a[100][100];
 
    for(int i=0;i<n+2;i++){
        for(int j=0;j<n+2;j++){
            if(i == 0 || j == 0 || i == n+1 || j == n+1 ){
                a[i][j] = 1;
            } else {
                cin>>a[i][j];
            }
        }
    }
 
    int ans = solve(a,1,1);
    cout<<ans;
        return 0;
}
